'''''Beyond Bree'' December 1984''' is an issue of ''[[Beyond Bree]]'', edited by [[Nancy Martsch]]. The issue reprints The Tengwar Numerals article from [[Quettar 13|''Quettar'' 13]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=65320|articlename=Beyond Bree. December 1984|dated=|website=TB|accessed=10 January 2012}}</ref>
==Contents==
*"The Tengwar Numerals" by [[Christopher Tolkien]] 
*"The Cirth Numerals" & "The Names of the Numbers" by [[Nancy Martsch]] 
*"Dragon" ill. by Giovanna Fregni 
*Oxonmoot report by [[Christina Scull]] 
*''The Hobbit'' illustrated by Michael Hague & the 1985 Tolkien Calendar, reviews by [[Christina Scull]]
*"Donaldson's Double Trilogy" by Robert Acker 
*"Iron Tower" review by Michael McCausland 
*Responses to Tolkien Memorial Forest proposal 
*"How I First Learned About Tolkien" (readers' responses) 
*Letters, News<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.cep.unt.edu/bree/Back-Issues1.pdf|articlename=Back Issue Index: March 1981 - February 1991|dated=|website=[http://www.cep.unt.edu/bree.html Beyond Bree]|accessed=10 January 2012}}</ref>

{{references}}
